pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Electro Leaf, 1 Fuse Cherry, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 50 Sun value.

pages.title: Stallers
pages.text: $(#25228d)E.M.Peaches disables all electronics in an area and stuns Zombies.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Electric Damage. Stuns Zombies for 5 seconds and Disable Machines and Electronics for 15 seconds.
$(br)$(#bd951a)E.M.Peach has grown tired of people lazily calling him E.M.Pea. "There's a C and H there for a reason people! And I've got the stone to prove it!"
